nodes.text: The Soup People were a group known for producing high-quality soups. They hailed from the astronomical object Tureen VI, which was located in the Tureen system in the Kriz sector of the Outer Rim Territories. Dexter Jettster, who owned the Dex's Diner restaurant on the Core Worlds planet Coruscant, claimed in his diner's menu that he served soup of the same quality as that of the Soup People prior to the eatery's destruction during the first two years of the Galactic Empire's reign.

The Soup People of Tureen VI were introduced in "Dining at Dex's," a 2009 Hyperspace-exclusive article written by Gregory Walker in the form of an in-universe menu. In his blog, Walker called the Soup People a silly throwaway reference, as a tureen is a dish used to hold soup.
